alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:10PM EDT until July 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Preble County in west central Ohio... Montgomery County in west central Ohio... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 809 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lewisburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Springboro, Vandalia, Englewood, Moraine, Oakwood, West Carrollton, Riverside, Clayton, Brookville, New Lebanon, Shiloh, Phillipsburg, Verona, Centerville, Fort Mckinley and Northview. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 16 and 30. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 42 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
